Gisborne paddler back-up for Kiwi canoe crews at Olympics https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/06/19/gisborne-paddler-back-up-for-kiwi-canoe-crews-at-olympics/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/06/19/gisborne-paddler-back-up-for-kiwi-canoe-crews-at-olympics/ John GilliesOvercoming heart condition to compete among world's best. Tue, 18 Jun 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Gisborne's Zach Ferkins has overcome a heart condition to be named reserve for the New Zealand men's canoe sprint crews at the Paris Olympics. If he was to get the chance to race, he would be following in the footsteps of Alan Thompson, Grant Bramwell and, more recently, Darryl Fitzgerald. Photo / Paul Rickard
